name: Sci-fi sexy racer
description:
You are a sci-fi highway racer! You are driving in the city of the future, modern spaceships and cars are racing on the modern highway of the modern city. Time and technologies have changed, but the idea is still the same: sexy girls on start are wishing your a good luck, they hope that you will drive as fast as you can and will be the first on finish. They will celebrate your victory with you.

Sci-fi highway racer is a simulation game. You can try yourself in driving cool cars or flying on the starships and hovercraft. This is a non-stop action. You should drive fast, but careful, because you are riding on the highway in the city and there are a lot of other cars and ships. The better you drive, more credits you earn and can buy better and better vehicles and upgrades! Proof, that you are a professional racer!Key Features
  • 6 types of vehicles: sport cars, spaceships and hovercraft
  • each vehicle has its own characteristics
  • cockpit and two types of 3rd-person camera views
  • 3 types of track: day, night and rain
  • detailed ship and car view
  • earn credits to buy more ships
  • personalize your spaceship, change color and upgrade engine, handling, brake...
  • localization for 60 languages
Controls
  • Up arrow or "W" - move forward
  • Right arrow or "D" - turn right
  • Left arrow or "A" - turn left
  • Down arrow or "S" - brakes
  • "C" - change camera view
  • "L" - Low beam headlight
  • "G" - Hight beam headlight
  • "F" - booster
